in addition to continuing the search for

phone service has been very spotty text
messages work in some places bad even

though because the authorities have now
imposed a curfew from nine o'clock at

they're giving people permits people who
live there to go inside part of that is
that they don't want people living in
structures that are are not safe but but
big reason is there they worry about

far much looting according to the police
